questionnaire.name: Software as a Service Request Form
questionnaire.keyInformation:
1. Please ensure you have checked the Transport Agencies Product List to see if the product has already been endorsed for use at the Agency. Endorsed products do not need to go through the SDLT for any security assurance activities.
  2. You will need information about the product you wish to implement in order to complete this questionnaire.
  3. It will take approximately 15 minutes to complete the initial questionnaire if you have all information availabile. You do not have to complete the form in one sitting. You will be emailed a link and have access through the "My Submissions" button on the homepage to complete it at a later date.
  4. If you do not complete the initial questionnaire and get your submission through to the summary screen, it will expire after 7 days. You will need to start again if this occurs. The questionnaire will not expire once you get to the summary screen and are working through the necessary tasks.
  5. Once you complete all tasks, or have no tasks, you will be able to send your submission through for approval. This form will be emailed to the relevant Transport Agency staff for approval. Approvals will be handled automatically through this process and you will be contacted when they have been completed.

questions.title: Existing Product
questions.questionHeading: Is this product currently, or previously in use at the Transport Agency?
questions.description:
Has this product already been cleared for use at the Transport Agency by the internal product team?

Please check the Transport Agency Product List spreadsheet to see if the product is listed. If the product can be found in the spreadsheet, please answer "yes".

If you're unsure, please contact Lauren Flohr, Head of Product.

answerActionFields.label: Yes
answerActionFields.message:
This product has already been approved for use by the Transport Agency product team. At this point, no security assurance activities are required. Please reach out to the product team (product@example.co.nz) to get information about getting access to this product.

 

Note: You do not need to complete the rest of this submission. This will appear in your "My Submissions" tab with a status of "In Progress" for 7 days before expiring. You do not need to make any follow ups about this submission with the security team.

questions.title: Funded By Transport Agency
questions.questionHeading: Has the Transport Agency paid for the development of this product?
questions.description:
Has this product been developed by the Transport Agency?

OR:

Has it been developed by a partner/vendor at the expense of the Transport Agency?

answerActionFields.label: Yes
answerActionFields.message: "Software as a Service" or "Cloud Products" developed by the Transport Agency cannot be assessed through this pillar. Please return to the landing page (by clicking Agency logo at the top of the page) and select the "Solution Delivery" pillar.

questions.title: Product Information
questions.questionHeading: Please enter details of the product
questions.description: Please enter the name, homepage and a contact email address for the product. If you do not have a contact within the product company, please put your own email address as point of contact.

questions.title: Business Owner
questions.questionHeading: Please enter details of the business owner for the use of this SaaS product
questions.description: The business owner is the person who can formally accept risks on behalf of the Agency to the data used in this product. This is a business line manager, not security. This person will know they're the business owner, as their role explicitly states that they can accept risk. This is not a developer, engineer or technical lead position.

questions.title: Product Description
questions.questionHeading: Please describe what the product does in plain English
questions.description: Include description of the product's features, the ones the Transport Agency wants to use and how we intend to use them.

questions.title: Product Purpose
questions.questionHeading: Please describe why the Transport Agency needs this product
questions.description: Include description of why this is important, why the Transport Agency needs this and what would happen if we don't fill this gap

questions.title: Release Date
questions.questionHeading: What is your expected go-live date for this product?

questions.title: Personal Information
questions.questionHeading: Will this SaaS product store customer personal information (PI)?
questions.description:
Personal Information is defined as any information about an identifiable individual (i.e. a living, natural person; not companies/charities/trusts etc). The information doesn’t need to identify a person by their name to be personal information, and it also doesn’t need to be private or sensitive. As long as there’s a reasonable chance that someone could be identified from the information - even if it’s only one person that makes the link between the information and the individual, and even if it’s only by linking it with other information - then it’s personal information. This includes information about other staff members and our customers.

All SaaS products used by the Agency that contain or use any form of Personal Information must go through a Privacy Threshold Assessment process. At the end of this questionnaire, a Privacy Threshold Assessment task will be completed. When completed, this task will be submitted to the Privacy Officers for review and approval.

For more information, and specific examples, please see the Privacy Page on OnRamp: https://onramp.example.co.nz/what-we-do/legal-services/privacy/

Note: If the product will only store the names and email addresses of Transport Agency staff as users of this system, please click the "Agency Staff Login Only" button.

questions.title: Types of Data
questions.questionHeading: Please list the types of data being used in this product
questions.description: Please list out the different types of data you'll be inputting or using into this software. (e.g. flow charts, names, emails, phone numbers)

questions.title: Agency Integration
questions.questionHeading: Will this SaaS product be integrating with any Transport Agency systems?
questions.description: Will this product receive information from or transfer data to any other Transport Agency systems?

questions.title: Data Transfer
questions.questionHeading: How is Transport Agency data being transferred to/from the SaaS Product?
questions.description: Please document the technologies being used to transfer data (e.g. Web Forms, FTP, SCP, Email etc)

questions.title: Description of Information
questions.questionHeading: Describe what Transport Agency information will be received, transmitted and stored by this product
questions.description: Please ensure as much information as possible about Transport Agency information that is utilised by this product. Any information that is stored by, transmitted to; or received from this product must be documented.

questions.title: Credit Card Payments
questions.questionHeading: Will this product accept Transport Agency customer credit cards?
questions.description: Will this product accept credit card payments from the NZ Public on behalf of the Transport Agency?

questions.title: Credit Card Connection
questions.questionHeading: Will this product directly talk to the Transport Agency Payment Micro-site or Common Payment Services (CPS) system?
questions.description: To use this product, will there need to be some integration with Transport Agency systems that handle payments? This includes the Payment Micro-site and Common Payment Services (CPS).

questions.title: Firewall Changes
questions.questionHeading: Will you require firewall changes to be made to use this product?
questions.description: If this product requires connections to/from Transport Agency systems that are not Web (e.g. Chrome/Edge/Firefox) the answer is probably Yes

questions.title: SaaS Users
questions.questionHeading: Please list the names and roles of Transport Agency staff who will use this product
questions.description: Users are the people who will be using the product. Please document the names, roles and permissions each user will get. If there are named groups within the product, please document the group that each user will belong to.

questions.title: Authentication
questions.questionHeading: Does this product integrate with the Transport Agency identity and access management platforms?
questions.description: Will this product integrate with Azure Active Directory or OKTA to manage Transport Agency user accounts?

questions.title: Other
questions.questionHeading: Is there any other information you'd like to submit with your application?
questions.description: Please include information that might be relevant to the Security Architects, Chief Information Security Officer or Business Owner.

questions.title: Next Steps
questions.description:
Next, you will need to review your answers to click "Submit Questionnaire".

If any tasks are required, these will be created and displayed for you to complete.

If no tasks are required, you will be able to click "Submit for Approval" to send your submission for approval.
